mapper.select: SELECT ci.id,ci.name,ci.`id_code` idCode,ci.`types`,ci.`contact`,ci.`phone`,ci.`address`,ci.`email`,ci.`tfn`,ci.`if_contract` ifContract, ci.`settlement_type` settlementType,ci.`account_period` accountPeriod,ci.`tax_rate` taxRate,ci.`tax_type` taxType,ci.`estate`,ci.`department_id` departmentId, d.`name` departmentName,ci.`ku_id` kuId,su1.`user_name` kuName,ci.`yw_id` ywId,su2.`user_name` ywName,ci.`audit_status` auditStatus, (CASE ci.`audit_status` WHEN '0' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN '1' THEN '待财务审核' WHEN '2' THEN '待总经办审核' WHEN '10' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '11' THEN '审核拒绝' END) auditStatusDesc, ci.`created_user` createdUser, DATE_FORMAT(ci.`created_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createdTimeStr, ci.`updated_user` updatedTimeStr,ci.`audit_comment` auditComment, DATE_FORMAT(ci.`updated_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') updatedTimeStr, (select GROUP_CONCAT(crl.legal_entity_id) from customer_rela_legal crl where crl.customer_info_id = ci.id group by ci.id) legalEntityIdStr FROM customer_info ci LEFT JOIN department d ON ci.`department_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su1 ON su1.`id` = ci.`ku_id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su2 ON su2.`id` = ci.`yw_id` where ci.id = #{id}

SELECT su.id, su.name, su.`en_user_name` enUserName, su.`user_name` userName, sr.`name` roleName, sr.`id` roleId, ci.`name` companyName, ci.id companyId, (SELECT t.user_name FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) departChargeName, (SELECT t.id FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) departmentChargeId, ( CASE su.`status` WHEN '0' THEN '关闭' WHEN '1' THEN '启用' END ) statusDesc, su.`created_user` createdUser, DATE_FORMAT( su.`created_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) createdTimeStr FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN system_user_role_relation surr ON su.`id` = surr.`user_id` LEFT JOIN system_role sr ON surr.`role_id` = sr.`id` LEFT JOIN customer_info ci ON su.`company_id` = ci.`id` WHERE su.user_type = '2' and su.id = #{id}
select id,name,id_code idCode from customer_info where id_code = #{idCode}
select ci.id,ci.id_code idCode,ci.`name`,ci.contact,ci.phone,ci.address from customer_info ci where ci.id in (select cru.unit_id from customer_rela_unit cru where cru.customer_info_id = #{id})

select ci.id,ci.id_code idCode,ci.`name`,ci.contact,ci.phone,ci.address from customer_info ci where ci.audit_status = '10' and ci.id not in (select cru.unit_id from customer_rela_unit cru where cru.customer_info_id = #{form.customerInfoId})
and ci.`name` like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and ci.id_code like concat('%',#{form.idCode},'%')

SELECT ci.id,ci.name,ci.`id_code` idCode,ci.`types`,ci.`contact`,ci.`phone`,ci.`address`,ci.`email`,ci.`tfn`,ci.`if_contract` ifContract, ci.`settlement_type` settlementType,ci.`account_period` accountPeriod,ci.`estate`,ci.`department_id` departmentId,d.`name` departmentName, ci.`ku_id` kuId,su1.`user_name` kuName,ci.`yw_id` ywId,su2.`user_name` ywName,ci.`audit_status` auditStatus,ci.`status`, (CASE ci.`audit_status` WHEN '0' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN '1' THEN '待财务审核' WHEN '2' THEN '待总经办审核' WHEN '10' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '11' THEN '审核拒绝' END) auditStatusDesc, ci.`created_user` createdUser, DATE_FORMAT(ci.`created_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createdTimeStr, ci.`updated_user` updatedUser,ci.`audit_comment` auditComment, DATE_FORMAT(ci.`updated_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') updatedTimeStr FROM `customer_info` ci LEFT JOIN department d ON ci.`department_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su1 ON su1.`id` = ci.`ku_id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su2 ON su2.`id` = ci.`yw_id` LEFT JOIN `customer_rela_legal` crl ON ci.`id` = crl.`customer_info_id` where 1 = 1
and ci.name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and ci.id_code like concat('%',#{form.idCode},'%')
and ci.yw_id = #{form.ywId}
and ci.contact like concat('%',#{form.contact},'%')
and ci.audit_status = #{form.auditStatus}
and ci.audit_status = 0
and ci.audit_status = 1
and ci.audit_status = 2
and crl.`legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}

select ci.id,name,id_code idCode,contact,phone,address,email,ci.created_time createdTimeStr from customer_info ci LEFT JOIN `customer_rela_legal` crl ON ci.`id` = crl.`customer_info_id`
audit_status = 10
and name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and id_code like concat('%',#{form.idCode},'%')
and crl.`legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}

select ci.id,name,id_code idCode,contact,phone,address,email,ci.created_time createdTimeStr from customer_info ci LEFT JOIN `customer_rela_legal` crl ON ci.`id` = crl.`customer_info_id`
audit_status = 10 and status = '1'
and crl.`legal_entity_id` in
